name: FROGS
description:
It's spring time again, and the FROGS are hanging around at the pond, listening to funky freestyle music and trying to prove who's the coolest of them all. For this, they are competing in some funny competitions, which you can re-enact using your Commodore C64/C128, in a group of up to 4 players! Throw your froggy friends into the pond by slapping them with your tongue, or eat all those tasty bugs before the other players are able to catch them!

This great action game supports the "Classical Games 4-Player Interface", which you can buy online for little money, or you can even build one by yourself. More information about this device can be found here.

You can choose whatever price you would like to pay for the game, even $0.00! If you're more into physical stuff however, you can check out the "Boxed Version" on frogs.drwuro.com

Note: This is a game for the Commodore C64 home computer. If you have no C64 or if you have no possibility to transfer .PRG or .D64 files to a real C64, you can use an Emulator like VICE to play it on your PC/Mac or similar (VICE actually supports 4 joysticks, btw).

Another Note: There will be a real Windows and Linux version soon, and possibly a Mac version too!
